fields.label: Tāpirihia he ataata
fields.description: Pāwhiri ki raro nei ki te tāpiri i tētahi ataata mō tō ataata pāhekoheko. Ka taea te whakauru hononga ataata, te tukuatu kōnae ataata rānei. Ka taea hoki te tuku i ētahi tukunga anō o te ataata, he rerekē kounga. Kia pai ai mō ngā pūtirotiro whānui, tukuna he kōnae webm, he kōnae mp4 hoki.

fields.label: Ngā kōwhiringa mata tīmatanga (kāore e tautokona mō ngā ataata YouTube])
Te taitara mō tēnei ataata pāhekoheko
fields.description: Ka whakamahia i ngā whakamārama, tauanga me ētahi atu horopaki.

fields.label: Hunaia te taitara ki te mata tīmatanga
Whakamārama poto (Kōwhiringa)
fields.description: Kōwhiringa. Whakaaturia he whakamārama poto ki te mata tīmatanga o te ataata. Kāore e taea tēnei mō ngā ataata YouTube.

fields.label: Pānui whakaahua
fields.description: He ata ka whakaaturia ki mua o te tīmatanga o te ataata. Kāore e taea tēnei mō ngā ataata YouTube.

fields.label: Ara whakapūaho (kāore e taea tēnei mō ngā ataata YouTube)
Tapanga Arahono
fields.description: Used if you offer multiple tracks and the user has to choose a track. For instance 'Spanish subtitles' could be the label of a Spanish subtitle track.

fields.label: Reo pūtake, me whakarite mō ngā kupu hauraro.
fields.description: Ka herea ki ngā tūtohu reo BCP 47 anake. Mehemea 'Whakapūaho' te momo arahono kua kōwhiritia, me tautuhi te reo pūtake.

fields.label: Arahono taunoa
fields.description: Ki te wātea tēnei, ki te kore e hāngai ki tētahi o ngā arahono kuputohu te ara taunoa, ko te arahono tuatahi te arahono taunoa.

fields.label: Whakaaturia hei
fields.description: Pātene he pāhekoheko kua whakapakutia, kia huakina, mā te pāwhiri a te kaiwhakamahi e huakina. Pānui whakaahua he pāhekoheko, kua whakarahia, ka whakaaturia ki runga i te ataata

fields.label: Ka huri hei pātene i ngā mata iti
Tapanga
fields.description: He tapanga ka whakaaturia ki te taha o te ata pāhekoheko.

fields.label: Nuku ki
fields.description: Whakaurua te wā i te hōputu: M:SS

fields.label: Tukuna mā te kaiwhakamahi e puta, e haere tonu rānei
Te mahi ina kei te hē
Nuku ki
fields.description: Whakaurua te wā i te hōputu: M:SS

fields.label: Tukuna mā te kaiwhakamahi e puta, e haere tonu rānei
Kia riro ngā piro katoa mō tēnei ngohe i mua i te panuku
fields.description: Kia pai ai ngā whakahaere, me haere ngātahi tēnei kōwhiringa me te kōwhiringa "Monoa te panuku ki mua o te ataata" mō ngā Ataata Pāhekoheko.

fields.label: Atarau pouaka
fields.description: Ka tāpiri i tētahi atarau hātea huri noa i te pāhekoheko. Tērā pea ka kōwhiri koe kia monoa tēnei mō ngā pāhekoheko e pūataata ana.

fields.label: Haere ki
fields.description: Te tūnga wā, ka kawea ai te kaiwhakamahi i tōna pāwhiri i te . Whakaurua te wā i te hōputu: M:SS.

fields.label: Tūramatia
fields.description: Whakaaturia te āheinga pāwhiri, mā te tāpiri i tētahi taitapa me tētahi ata hoki

fields.label: Whakaaturia kei
fields.description: Te kaute o ngā hēkona ki mua i te mutunga o te ataata.

fields.label: Ka tīmata te ataata i te wā
fields.description: Whakaurua te wā i te hōputu: M:SS

fields.label: Purei-aunoa te ataata
fields.description: Ka tīmata aunoa purei o te ataata

fields.label: Toaitia te ataata
fields.description: Ina e hiahiatia ana kia toaitia te ataata, kōwhirita tēnei

fields.label: Aukatingia te pātene "Whakaatu Otinga"
fields.description: Mā tēnei kōwhiringa e whakatau mehemea e whakaaturia te pātene "Whakaatu Otinga"  mō ngā pātai katoa, ka monoa mō ngā pātai katoa, ka taea te kōwhiri rānei mō ia pātai motuhake.

fields.label: Aukatingia te pātene "Whakamātau anō"button
fields.description: Mā tēnei kōwhiringa e whakatau mehemea e whakaaturia te pātene "Whakamātau anō" mō ngā pātai katoa, ka monoa mō ngā pātai katoa, ka taea te kōwhiri rānei mō ia pātai motuhake.

fields.label: Kia tūwhera te tahua tohuwāhi i te tīmatanga
fields.description: Kāore e taea tēnei taumahi mō ngā īPapa e whakamahi ana te YouTube hei pūtake ataata.

fields.label: Whakaaturia te pātene rere whakamuri mō ngā hēkona 10
Monoa te panuku
fields.description: Mā ēnei kōwhiringa e aukati i te whakatere a te kaiwhakamahi, i runga i ngā tautuhinga.

fields.label: Aukatingia te puoro
fields.description: Ki te kā tēnei kōwhiringa, ka aukatingia te oro ataata, ka aukati hoki i te whakakā puoro mō te ataata.

fields.label: Tapanga taunoa mō te pātene rapunga urutau
Tapanga taunoa mō te pātene  for continue video button
Tapanga taunoa mō te pātene kōwhiringa mātakitaki
Whakatauria te tere o te ataata
Tapanga, mono te whakatere ki mua
fields.default: Kua mono te whakatere ki mua

fields.label: Warning that the user must answer the question correctly before continuing
fields.default: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.

fields.label: Te tapanga e kī ana kua puta tētahi pāhekoheko
Te tapanga e kī ana kua puta ētahi pāhekoheko
Karere mō ngā pātai kua whakautua (ka kuhuna te kaute o ngā pātai kua whakautua ki @answered)
Taitara Mata Whakauru
fields.description: Ka kuhuna te kaute o ngā pātai kua whakautua ki @answered.

fields.label: Pārongo mō te mata whakauru
fields.default: Kua whakautu koe i ngā pātai (e) @answered, pāwhiri ki raro ki te tuku i ō whakautu.
fields.description: Ka kuhuna te kaute o ngā pātai kua whakautua ki @answered.

fields.label: Pārongo mō te mata whakauru ina monoa te pātene whakauru
fields.default: Kua whakautu koe i ngā pātai (e) @answered.
fields.description: Ka kuhuna te kaute o ngā pātai kua whakautua ki @answered.

fields.label: Pārongo mata whakauru mō ngā whakautu kāore i oti
fields.default: Kāore anō koe kia whakautu i tētahi pātai.

fields.label: Pārongo mata whakauru mō ngā pātai me whakautu
fields.default: Me utu te pātai kotahi neke atu rānei kia taea ai te tuku i ō whakautu.

fields.label: Mata whakauru karere mō te tukunga
Mata whakauru, taitara kapa tūtohi: Ngā pātai kua whakautua
Mata whakauru, taitara kapa tūtohi: Ngā Piro
Mata whakauru, piro mō ngā pātai kua whakautua
Mata whakauru rārangi whakarāpopoto me ngā piro (mō ngā taupānga pānui mata)
fields.default: I whiwhi koe @score o ngā piro @total mō te @question i puta ā muri i te @minutes miniti, @seconds hēkona.

fields.label: Mata whakauru rārangi whakarāpopoto kore piro (mō ngā taupānga pānui mata)
fields.default: Kua whakautu koe i te @question i puta i te @minutes miniti, @seconds hēkona.

fields.label: He pārongo, me pēhea te tīmata i ngā pāhekoheko
fields.default: Mātakitaki i te kiriata ki te tīmata i ngā pāhekoheko
